post.title: Harris County
post.description: Harris County is the third-most-populous county in the U.S. Houston is the county seat.

mainImage.alt: Many of the same residents exposed for decades to a harmful chemical have been given a whole new burden: proving it.
mainImage.caption: Many of the same residents exposed for decades to a harmful chemical have been given a whole new burden: proving it.

node.title: Residents of Houston's Fifth Ward fight for 'restitution' from the contamination in their community

children.text: Many of the residents who saw loved ones die and were exposed themselves for decades to a cancer-causing chemical have been given a whole new burden: proving it.

node.Action1Title: Read about Fifth Ward residents who vow, 'We're not going anywhere'

mainImage.alt: Christian Menefee was elected as Harris County Attorney in 2020.
mainImage.caption: Christian Menefee was elected as Harris County Attorney in 2020.

node.title: 'A sword and a shield': A conversation about accountability with Harris County Attorney Christian Menefee

children.text: 'Every day, I'm either protecting people or holding others accountable,' Menefee says. So far, his list includes Gov. Greg Abbott and the Texas Department of Transportation.

node.Action1Title: Read a series of personal essays about the harms of the I-45 expansion

mainImage.alt: Menefee says, 'We're going to raise hell, we're going to have fights. Sometimes we're going to win, sometimes we're going to lose.'
mainImage.caption: Menefee says, 'We're going to raise hell, we're going to have fights. Sometimes we're going to win, sometimes we're going to lose.'

node.title: ‘Make trouble’: A conversation about servant leadership with Harris County Attorney Christian Menefee

children.text: 'Ultimately, I was elected by the people of Harris County, which includes Fifth Ward, and Third Ward, and Sunnyside, and Independence Heights, and the East End. And so I have to do what I have to do for those communities.'

node.Action1Title: Read the first part of this conversation about accountability with Menefee
